forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. South wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 69 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
In the cool stillness of the early morning, the skies over Downtown San Francisco lend a promise of clarity, hinting at a day that will unfold under a sunlit embrace. As the city begins to stir from its slumber, the gentle whisper of a southward breeze brushes past, inviting outdoor pursuits. Today, expect the air to warm to a comfortable level, ultimately settling into that delightful afternoon coolness for which this iconic city is known. Although the forecast hints at a mostly sunny disposition, the subtle presence of a marine layer could still linger at the edges, teasing at the coastline while offering the allure of misty landscapes from a distance.

Dressing in layers would be prudent as the warmth of the sun contrasts with the brisk morning chill. Perhaps a light cardigan over a T-shirt, paired with comfortable walking shoes, would suit you well—perfect for a leisurely stroll through the city’s vibrant streets or a visit to one of its many bustling coffee shops. Embrace the opportunity to explore hidden gems, from artisanal bakeries offering fresh pastries to art-lined alleyways just waiting to be discovered. As the day unfolds, there’s a simple pleasure in sitting at an outdoor café, sipping a warm beverage and watching the world glide by, wrapped in the easy brilliance of a San Francisco day.
